A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie\, Phantom Menace is an Oscar Winner compared to this one. They must have paid a lot of critics\, I cannot imagine how else this movie has such high reviews. Rifled with plot holes and inconsistencies\, it felt like this movie was written by a mentality challenged high schooler. \n\nThere are so many \"What in actual the f***!?!?\" moments...Society has reached a point where the media/critics will tell you what to think\, and a good amount of mindless lemmings will spout the generic \"Amazing movie!\" line. This is getting sad...
